CustomField.formula:
IF( In_Force__c, IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDJB',""),
IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Tail/Run Off")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "BORed away")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Closed Lost")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Non-Renewed by Insured")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled by Insured")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled - Off Risk")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled - Nonpayment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"Cancelled - Noncompliance")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c,"New Business - BOR to Cancel")), Today()> Renewal_Date__c ),"",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Tail/Run Off" ), IMAGE('/resource/154402264100/BlueFlag',""),
IF( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "BORed away" ), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqj',""),
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Closed Lost" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Non-Renewed by Insured" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled by Insured" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Off Risk" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Nonpayment" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancelled - Noncompliance" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "New Business - BOR to Cancel") ), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqo',""),
IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Policy Delivered / Closed Won" ),ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Stamping / Accounting" )), TODAY() > Effective_Date__c, TODAY() > Renewal_Date__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Tail/Run Off")) ), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDJB',""), IF( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Policy Delivered / Closed Won" ),ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Stamping / Accounting" )), TODAY() < Effective_Date__c), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqt',""),
IF( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Processing" ), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqy',""),
"" )))))) ))
CustomField.label: In-Force CC
